### Support Sudan & Diaspora-Owned Businesses

The war in Sudan has affected millions of people. Over **5 million** Sudanese have been forced to leave their homes because of the fighting, and many have lost their jobs and businesses. In fact, about **50%** of people have lost their jobs due to the conflict, making it even harder for families to survive and rebuild.
